sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SWINGING, a kind of exerciſe ſtrongly recommended to perſons in conſumption by ſome physicians, and diſapproved of by others. See Medicine, p. 224.
SWING-tree of a waggon, is the bar faſtened acroſs the fore-guide, to which the traces of the horſes are faſtened.
S wing-W heel, in a royal pendulum, that wheel which drives the pendulum. In a watch or balance clock it is called the crown-wheel,
